metadata.title: CVE-2018-25013 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in libwebp in versions before 1.0.1. An out-of-bounds read was found in function ShiftBytes. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and to the service availability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-25013` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwebp6 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
libwebpdemux2 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
libwebpmux3 - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
webp - 0.6.1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libwebp package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2ubuntu1').
